name: Mimi's Party Fun!
description:
Back of Case - Nintendo DS (US) (from Ad Blurbs)

Join Mimi in throwing the coolest, most hip parties ever in Mimi's Party Fun for your Nintendo DS. Mimi has always wanted to become Prom Queen and can only do it with your help by dazzling her new friends in over 60 levels of frenzied, party fun! Take up the mantle of party coordinator as you help her prepare fanciful platters, manage guest needs, and even DJ the dance floor. Customize Mimi's party room with new party themes, threads, and equipment to ensure her status as the hippest girl in school!
  • Play through over 60 levels on 12 season themed stages,
  • Take part in 12 different mini-games to keep Mimi's guest coming back for more!,
  • Customize It!: Redecorate the lounge with new furniture, a fresh coat of paint, or update the dance floor with a hip new look!
